EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Platform Roadshow - CenturyLink_Q215.Toronto Cancel
EmailTemplate.subject: The Cloud Platform Seminar Series in Toronto has been rescheduled!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Due to unforeseeable circumstances, the new date for the Cloud Platform Seminar Series will now be Thursday, October 8, 2015. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you. Should you have questions or concerns, please contact Kim Marie Ruquet <mailto:kruquet@pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
